articles.description: Indiana will host North Carolina in the 2022 Big Ten-ACC Challenge, the Big Ten announced Friday morning.
articles.content:
Indiana will host North Carolina in the 2022 Big Ten-ACC Challenge, the Big Ten announced Friday morning.
The matchup will take place on Wednesday, November 30.
